Title: Growing up beside Chairman Mao
Designer: Shaanxi Provincial Fine Arts Creation Group (陕西省美术创作组)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社), Beijing
Notes: Mao teaching soldiers in Yan'an. He holds an exercise book (練習本), the text on the slate reads Fight Japan - Save China (打日本 - 救中国). The newly planted trees on the right my be seen as a metaphor.
